title: AIA Welcomes Cynthia Kopesky as New Senior Vice President of Finance - Promo Marketing
content: AIA Welcomes Cynthia Kopesky as New Senior Vice President of Finance  Promo Marketing
description: AIA Corporation (AIA) announced that Cynthia Kopesky, CMA, CPA, has joined the company as senior vice president of finance. Kopesky will serve as a key leader of AIAâ€™s Executive Leadership Team and will provide strategic direction and leadership on all financial-related activities for the company.
